title: Inflation
description: Why Do We Care About Inflation?
contents:
Let’s review why we care about inflation - and what the differences are between relative price changes and changes in the price level.
Changes in the price level
The following plot shows headline inflation.



The following charts break down changes in individual inflation components:



How broad -ased is the increase in inflation? Relative to pre-pandemic times, it looks as if most key components show rising prices.



Note: This post was created with Distill. Learn more about using Distill at https://rstudio.github.io/distill.

title: Welcome to Economic Tidbits: Why It Matters
description:
Economic Tidbits, or: Why It Matters. 

Background information on why we post what we post on https://twitter.com/EconomicsShiny
contents:
Lots of information about economics is out there. Here we explain what we’re focused on, and why. Updated tweets with the latest economic data can then be found here:
https://twitter.com/EconomicsShiny
